page.title: 11FAMILY WEEK_END _ CLEE HILL
page.content:
It is 8.30 on a{Saturday morning} when I leave home to go swimming with my brother and friend at the pool in Tenbury Wells, where my Mum works. We return home for lunch. In the afternoon, I help my brother do his paper round. My Mum arrives home at about 18.15. My Dad races pigeons, so at about 19.00, he and my brother go to pigeon club. During the evening, I watch T.V or go out to play.
On a{Sunday morning,}my family have a lie in. We get up at about 9.30. I make breakfast, then Ifeed my pets, and help Mum get dinner and tidy up. We have a roast dinner at 12.45. In the afternoon, my Dad tends the pigeons while Mum gardens. We go to my Nans for tea. We return home at 20.45 and I am in bed by 21.45.
